review_body: I stayed here on business in November for a week. The self serviced apartment had everything I needed and was a lovely size, bed super comfy and linen gorgeous. I had an issue with not understanding the washing machine but thats to do with my ineptness. The whole building is beautiful and effortlessly run. I loved it and was so close to the office for me. The pool is a saving grace too, its open til 10pm so was good to get a swim in every evening before bed to help with the jet lag.

Very large room for the price. Extremely well maintained and clean. Awesome bathrooms/showers. Very very friendly and helpful staff who assisted us with restaurant bookings and advice. In a very good location, and the view from our apartment on the 28th floor overlooking the imperial palace and gardens was spectacular.

The chick in was easy and fast, staff was very friendly and helpful, the room was clean and big, the room quitenes, nice view. Near of Tokyo station And restaurants. The quality of bathroom shampoo body cream was excellent.
